Mayor's Office for People with Disabilities

  1. Mayor's Office for People with Disabilities

The Mayor's Office for People with Disabilities (MOPD) works to make Chicago a world-class accessible city on behalf of residents and visitors with disabilities.

To leave information about a recent experience with a MOPD program or service, please email MOPDFeedback@cityofchicago.org or call 312-746-5773 and select option 1, and a Disability Specialist will follow up with you.
